### Mandatory Details for Submission

When submitting a bid, ensure supporting documentation is provided for geographical zone and delivery details. The following should be included:

* Offeror's geographical zone(s) and services targeted towards locations listed
* Detailed breakdown of dietary services offered and methods of delivery including specialized requirements
* Must specify the following distances applies to delivery
Delivery of the required items to     
• Saskatchewan  
• Alberta  
• Manitoba     
#### Related Information


A contract for the supply and delivery of Miscellaneous Groceries as and when requested is required by Correctional Services Canada (CSC) on behalf of PWGSC for Correctional Services Canada. The procurement of discretionary services is required on an as and when requested basis, and geographically zone-based Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISO) are to be facilitated by TPSGC/PWGS.
